tool_description: Sunrise, sunset and other sun-related computations for given locations and dates/times.
name: Sun Calculator
title: Sun Calculator

api_list.name: Sunrise and Sunset
api_list.description: Returns the exact sunrise and sunset timestamp for a given location and date. The timestamps are in seconds since UNIX epoch (1970-01-01). For dates prior to UNIX epoch (pre-1970) timestamps will be negative.
